mapper.select: select workspace_seq.nextval from dual
select workspacedetail_seq.nextval from dual

select l.loccode,locname,locename,lat,lng,savefilename from location l join locationcode c on l.loccode=c.loccode
instr(locname,#{name}) > 0
select l.loccode,locname,locename,lat,lng,savefilename, memo from location l join locationcode c on l.loccode=c.loccode where l.loccode=#{locCode}
insert into workspace(workcode,subject,daycount,startday,endday,loccode,userIdx,pay) values(#{seqNum},#{title},#{dayCount},#{startDay},#{endDay},#{locCode},#{userIdx},#{pay})

select lm.landcode, loccode, landname, lat, lng, saveFilename, tagCode from landmark lm join landmarkfile lmf on lm.landcode=lmf.landcode
where instr(landName,#{landName}) >0 and locCode = #{locCode} and isMain=1
where locCode = #{locCode} and isMain=1
select landcode, loccode, landname, lat, lng, tagCode, saveFilename from landmark lm join landmarkfile lmf on lm.landcode = lmf.landcode where locCode=#{locCode} and tagCode=${tagNum} and isMain=1
select nvl(count(*),0) from workspacedetail where day=#{day} and workCode=#{workCode}
select detailCode from workspacedetail where day=#{day} and workCode=#{workCode}

select wl.landCode, lat, lng, landName, tagCode, savefilename from workland wl join landmark lm on wl.landCode = lm.landCode left outer join landmarkfile lmf on wl.landCode = lmf.landCode where wl.detailCode = (select detailCode from workspacedetail where day=#{day} and workCode=#{workCode}) order by orderNum asc

select wl.landCode, lat, lng, landName, tagCode, savefilename,day,orderNum from workland wl join landmark lm on wl.landCode = lm.landCode join workspacedetail wsd on wl.detailcode=wsd.detailcode left outer join landmarkfile lmf on wl.landCode = lmf.landCode where workCode=#{workCode} order by day asc, orderNum asc
select unique locName,w.locCode, count(locName) over(partition by locName) as count from workspace w join locationCode c on w.locCode = c.locCode where userIdx=#{userIdx}

select unique locName,w.locCode, count(locName) over(partition by locName) as count from workspace w join locationCode c on w.locCode = c.locCode
and pay=#{routeSort}
select userIdx from workspace where workCode=#{workCode}

select w.workCode, u.userName,w.subject,to_char(startDay,'YYYY.MM.DD') startDay,to_char(endDay,'YYYY.MM.DD') endDay,dayCount,u.userIdx,to_char(w.created,'YYYY.MM.DD') created, w.locCode,pay,saveFilename from workspace w join tb_user u on w.userIdx=u.userIdx join location l on w.locCode = l.locCode where workCode=#{workCode} and u.userIdx=#{userIdx}

select unique w.landCode, landName, workLandCode, tagName, saveFilename, orderNum,lm.lat,lm.lng, w.budget, w.memo from workland w join landmark lm on w.landCode=lm.landCode join landmarkfile lmf on w.landCode = lmf.landCode join lndTagCode ltc on lm.tagCode = ltc.tagCode where w.detailCode = ( select detailCode from workspaceDetail wd join workspace ws on wd.workCode = ws.workCode where wd.workCode=#{workCode} and userIdx=#{userIdx} and day=#{day} ) and isMain=1 order by orderNum asc
select nvl(count(*),0) from workspaceDetail where workCode=#{workCode}
select budget from workspaceDetail where workCode=#{workCode} and day=#{day}
select budget from workspace where workCode=#{workCode}
mapper.update: update workLand set budget=#{budget}, memo=#{memo} where worklandCode=#{workLandCode}
mapper.select: select budget,memo from workLand where worklandCode=#{worklandCode}
mapper.update: update workspaceDetail set budget=#{budget} where workCode=#{workCode} and day=#{day}
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(budget),0) from workspaceDetail where workCode=#{workCode}
select nvl(count(*),0) from paidRoute where userIdx=#{userIdx} and workCode=#{workCode}
